verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda parishudda parishudda prabhuvaa Vara doota laina nin varnimpa galaraa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda janakudaa paramaatma roopudaa Nirupama bala buddi neethi prabhaavaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda thanayudaa nara roopa daarudaa Narulanu rakshinchu karunaa samudraa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddamagu naatma varamulidu naatma Paramaa nanda prema bhakhtula kidumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janaka kumaaraatmalanu neka devaa Ghana mahima chellunu danara nityamuga{/lang-eng}
